chapter.title: &susemgr; Getting Started
chapter.para: This document presents a concise guide for setting up a basic &susemgr; test Server. Each chapter should be followed in chronological order as each section builds upon the former.
This guide is intended for system administrators.

sect1.title: Introduction to &susemgr;
sect1.para: &susemgr; provides a solution for organizations requiring absolute control of maintenance and package deployment on their servers. It allows customers the greatest flexibility and power in keeping their servers up-to-date securely while facilitating and advancing an organizations system life-cycle management requirements.

sect1.title: What Can &susemgr; Accomplish for My Organization?
sect1.para: &susemgr; lets you efficiently manage large sets of Linux systems and keep them up to date. It provides automated and cost-effective software management, asset management, and system provisioning. The new addition of Saltstack in &susemgr; 3 provides powerful event-driven configuration and management capabilities for fine grained control of any modern infrastructure. &susemgr; is now a Salt-master capable of commanding thousands of Salt-minions (&susemgr; Clients) via remote execution. &susemgr; is also fully compatible with Red Hat Satellite Server and offers seamless management of both &sle; and &rhel; Linux client systems.
